newsitem.title: USA: Stallone's daughter has hole in heart.
newsitem.headline: Stallone's daughter has hole in heart.

text.p: Movie star Sylvester Stallone's two-month-old daughter has a hole in the heart and the actor and his fiancee Jennifer Flavin are taking "the necessary steps" concerning the girl's health, Stallone's publicist said on Wednesday.
Paul Bloch said the baby, Sophia Rose, born on Aug. 27 in Miami, had been diagnosed with a hole in the heart.
"Mr Stallone says they are taking the necessary steps," Bloch said, without elaborating on whether the baby was undergoing or about to undergo surgery.
"He and Miss Flavin are concerned, but optimistic about the outcome," Bloch told Reuters.
The couple's first baby weighed 7 pounds 4 ounces (3.28 kilograms), when she was born at South Miami Hospital. At the time, Bloch said both mother and baby were in "wonderful health."

He said Stallone, best known for the "Rocky" and "Rambo" movies, left the set of "Copland", which was filming in New York and New Jersey, to be with Flavin, a model, for the birth. The couple live in Florida.
